girlfriends.name: Himu
girlfriends.dialogue: I smile only when I see you 🥰

girlfriends.name: Jonaki
girlfriends.dialogue: You light up my heart like fireflies 🌟

girlfriends.name: Jannat
girlfriends.dialogue: You're the heaven I never want to leave 😇

girlfriends.name: Ichrat
girlfriends.dialogue: When I’m with you, everything feels perfect 💖

girlfriends.name: Hujaifa
girlfriends.dialogue: Your voice is my favorite melody 🎶

girlfriends.name: Bristi
girlfriends.dialogue: Every drop of rain reminds me of you 🌧️❤️

girlfriends.name: Jinuk
girlfriends.dialogue: You're the pearl of my little ocean 🐚

girlfriends.name: Humaira
girlfriends.dialogue: Your smile is my strongest addiction 😍
